AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqgated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for gated: Checks whether the system is configured to be a router or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for IPSec: Checks whether IPSec is enabled or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks whether herald value is set or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnosyn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for NoSyn: Checks whether IPSec is enabled or not. If it is not, then enables it.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for root login: Checks whether any non-root user exists that has login privileges.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for remote root login: Checks whether any non-root user exists with privileges to login remotely.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqsed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for SED: Checks whether the machine has 64 bit kernel support or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqda
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for disableacct: Adds /bin/false to shells in login.cfg, if it does not exist.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has Trusted Execution feature on or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum age for password: Specifies the minimum number of weeks to 0 weeks before a password can be changed.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum age for password: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (13 weeks at least 90 days) that a password is valid.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Time to change password after the expiration: Specifies the maximum number of weeks to 8 weeks of maxage that an expired password need to be changed by the user.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum length for password: Specifies the minimum length of password to 7 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 1 to ensure that the password contains alphabetic characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of non-alphabetic chars: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum times a char can appear in a password: Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 8.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse: Specifies the number of weeks to 52 weeks before a password can be reused.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse limit: Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 6 for each non-root user account before the account is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable login after unsuccessful login attempts: Specifies the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port to 6 before the port is locked.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Implements PCI Section 8.5.14: Reenable login after locking: Specifies the time interval (30 minutes) after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remote root login: Disables remote root login. Activation on need basis by system admin followed by deactivation.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local login: Enables root to login locally.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_dbaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable audit: Enables bin auditing.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_dislpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable lpd daemon: Stops lpd daemon and comments the lpd entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_discde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable CDE: Disables CDE when LFT is not configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_distimedmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Stops timed daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_disntpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable NTP daemon: Stops NTP daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_disrwhoddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rwhod daemon: Stops rwhod daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_dissnmpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable SNMP daemon: Change vendor supplied defaults. Stops SNMP daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_dissnmpmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable SNMPMIBD daemon: Stops SNMPMIBD daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_disaixmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable AIXMIBD daemon: Stops AIXMIBD daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_hostmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable HOSTMIBD daemon: Stops HOSTMIBD daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_disdpid2dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable DPID2 daemon: Stops DPID2 daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_disdhcpserv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable DHCP Server: Stops DHCP server daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_disdhcpagent
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable DHCP Agent: Stops DHCP relay agent and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_shell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rshd daemon: Comments the entry for rshd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rlogind in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rlogind daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rexecd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rexecd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rexecd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rexecd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_comsat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable comsat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for comsat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of comsat.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_fingerd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services. Disable fingerd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for fingerd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of fingerd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_systat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable systat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for systat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of systat.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_netstat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable netstat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for netstat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and stops instances of netstat.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable tftpd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for tftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_talk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable talkd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for talkd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of talkd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rquotad
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rquotad in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rquotad daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rquotad.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rstatd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services. Disable rstatd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rstatd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rstatd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rusersd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rusersd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rusersd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rusersd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rwalld
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable rwalld in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rwalld daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rwalld.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_sprayd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable sprayd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for sprayd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of sprayd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_pcnfsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable pcnfsd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for pcnfsd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of pcnfsd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_tcpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: db_tcpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: db_tcpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: db_tcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of daytime(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: db_tcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of timed(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: db_udpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: db_udpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: db_udpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: db_udpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and stops the daytime(udp) service.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and stops the time(udp) service.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_ftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable ftpd: Comments the entry for ftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and stops ftpd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable telnetd: Comments the entry for telnetd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and stops telnetd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_dtspc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable dtspcd: Comments the entry for dtspcd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf when LFT is not configured and CDE is disabled in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_ttdbserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ttdbserver service.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_cmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unnecessary and insecure services: Disable cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of cmsd service.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rmsuidfrmrcmds
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Removes SUID from remote commands: Removes SUID from remote commands rcp, rdist, rexec, remsh, rlogin, and rsh.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_enablenfs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable NFS daemon: Enables NFS mounts, starts NFS daemons and enables NFS from startup.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_disrmtcmds
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unsecure commands: Disables unsecure commands rlogin, rsh, rcp, and tftp.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_disrmtdmns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable unsecure daemons: Disables unsecure daemons rlogind, rshd, and tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rmrhostsnetrc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove rhosts and netrc services: Removes .rhosts and .netrc files from user's home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file: Removes entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option clean_partial_conns: Set network option clean_partial_conns's value to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_tcp_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_tcpsecure: Set network option tcp_tcpsecure to 7. Protection against data RST and SYN attacks.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_ipsecshunhost
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Shun host for 5 minutes: Shuns the hosts for 5 minutes that tried to access un-used ports.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_ipsecshunports
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Guard host against port scans: Shuns vulnerable ports for 5 minutes to guard the host against port scans.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Object creation permissions: Specifies default object creation permissions to 022.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_limitsysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Limit system access: Makes root the only user in cron.allow file and removes the cron.deny file.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rmdotfrmpathroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove dot from root path: Removes dot from PATH environment variable from files .profile, .kshrc, .cshrc and .login in root's home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rmdotfrmpathnroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove dot from non-root path: Removes dot from PATH environment variable from files .profile, .kshrc, .cshrc, and .login in user's home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_chetcftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Add root user in /etc/ftpusers file: Adds root username in /etc/ftpusers file.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_removeguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove guest account: Removes guest account and its files.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_sedconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable SED feature: Enable Stack Execution Disable feature.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_rootpwdintchk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Root Password Integrity Check: Makes sure that the root password being set is not weak.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_autologoff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Set session idle time: Require the user to reenter password if the session is idle for more than 15 minutes.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_tcptr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: TCP Traffic Regulation High: Enforces denial-of-service mitigation on popular ports.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_SecureLPM
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable automated IPSEC Tunnel creation between VIO Servers during live partition migration.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_ipsecpermit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Allow the packets from HMC.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_sysintegrity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maintaining the system integrity by detecting, removing and protecting against known types of malicious software.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_enableRbac
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable RBAC by creating so, sa, and isso users with appropriate roles.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_encryptNt_traffic
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Encrypt the Network Traffic.

AIXPertEntry.name: db_SecurityPatches
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Apply all security patches related to Operating System.
